name: The world after the end
description:
THE WORLD AFTER THE END is a short project created by one person for Post-Apocalyptic Jam 2017 in 20 days, so you may encounter bugs and problems while playing.

The story of THE WORLD AFTER THE END is a fictional story, any resemblance to reality is pure coincidence.

STORY:

The world grows at an incredibly fast pace.

There is less and less natural resources, less water, less food... and the world population continues to grow.

The governments of the first world powers decide to develop a preventive secret plan against a hypothetical situation of shortage and overpopulation of the planet. The project was called MANKIND.

But the governments lose control over the project and put in danger the existence of the human race.

We survive in an underground bunker in the middle of nowhere, without knowing if there are any survivors. We only have a radio with which we try to communicate every day with someone who can listen us and shed a ray of hope... But there is never an answer. Are we really alone? Should we go further in search of more survivors?

CONTROLS:
WASD - movement (walk front, left, back, right)
Mouse movement - Rotate camera / look around
Mouse left click - Interact
Mouse right click - Hold to zoom
Escape - open in-game pause-menu
